attributes.action: Introduce a UK National Children's Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to introduce a National Children’s Day into the UK ; to recognise children who are with us or for those who are no longer part of our world. This petition was started by Jo Cameron well-known media personality, businesswoman and Patron of SANDS. 

This petition is to celebrate National Children's Day on the last Sunday in August every year. It makes a perfect holiday time celebration because it will usually be the last Sunday in the school holidays and may fall on a bank holiday. 

Other countries have their own National Children’s Day and we should have one too! It’s the children’s equivalent to Mother’s and Father’s Day.

The day will be used to spend time with our children and remind them how special they are. As a bereaved parent, Jo hopes that it will allow other bereaved parents to recognise their children on the same day as everyone else.  

NB : In 1954 the UN recommended that all countries have a Children's Day and many countries have already followed this guidance.
